issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
TextField's focus event not working properly
This is not regression. 

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to KS> BASE UI> TextArea> Basic
2. Click on Blur Button.KeyBoard goes down and textarea gets blurred.
3. Click on Focus Button.

Actual:
Keyboard does not get open and even label is also not updated.

Expected:
Keyboard should get open and label must be updated accordingly.
fields.summary: Android: Kitchensink - TextField's focus event not working properly
fields.environment:
Tested with: 
SDK:3.1.2.v20130725180746
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.2.201307171817
OS: OSX 10.7.5
Device:Google nexus 7 (v 4.2.1)

comments.body:
It is an expected behavior. 
Marking as invalid.
